name: Sim.life
body:
## Grandroids 
### http://grandroids.com/
"virtual creatures constructed from complex networks of virtual brain cells and biochemical reactions and genes"

Developed by Steve Grand, creator of Creatures.

**Other Links**
* [Grandroids FAQ](https://stevegrand.wordpress.com/2011/03/02/grandroids-faq/)]
* [Progress diary](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WDKL-2vihuaRLHjsZCxtr6qj0oCe8lV82inwmCVrjBs/pub)
* [Steve Grand (Wikipedia)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Grand_(roboticist))

***

## OpenWorm
### http://www.openworm.org/
"OpenWorm is an open source project dedicated to creating a virtual C. elegans nematode in a computer."
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
